select.name: raw-type
select.label: Select input file type
select.help: Specify the type of input file you want to use

filelist.name: mzml_paths
filelist.label: Select Thermo RAW files
filelist.help: Warning: Thermo RAW files cannot be read for now, the files will be automatically converted to mzML files

filelist.name: database.fasta
filelist.label: Select FASTA file
filelist.help: Specify the FASTA file you want to use

checkbox.name: database.prefilter
checkbox.label: Prefilter
checkbox.help: Only activate this option when you expect your search space to be huge and exceed the amount of memory.

number.name: database.prefilter_chunk_size
number.label: Chunk size
number.help: Split the FASTA file in chunks, high values may consume all available memory, low values will slow down the search.

number.name: database.bucket_size
number.label: Bucket size
number.help: How many fragments are in each internal mass bucket. Use a lower value (8192) for high-res MS/MS, and higher values for low-res MS/MS.

number.name: database.enzyme.missed_cleavages
number.label: Missed cleavages
number.help: Number of missed cleavages to allow. Default is 1.

number.name: database.enzyme.min_len
number.label: Minimum peptide length
number.help: Minimum AA length of peptides to search. Default is 5.

number.name: database.enzyme.max_len
number.label: Maximum peptide length
number.help: Maximum AA length of peptides to search. Default is 50.

string.name: database.enzyme.cleave_at
string.label: Amino acids to cleave at
string.help: Leave empty for non-enzymatic digestion, use '$' to disable digestion and use sequences as they are in the file. Default is 'KR'

string.name: database.enzyme.restrict
string.label: Do not cleave if this AA follows the cleavage site

checkbox.name: database.enzyme.c_terminal
checkbox.label: Cleave at C-terminus of matching amino acid

number.name: database.peptide_min_mass
number.label: Minimum peptide mass
number.help: Minimum monoisotopic mass of peptides to fragment. Default is 500.

number.name: database.peptide_max_mass
number.label: Maximum peptide mass
number.help: Maximum monoisotopic mass of peptides to fragment. Default is 5000.

checklist.name: database.ion_kinds
checklist.label: Ion kinds
checklist.help: Which fragment ions to generate and search? Default is b and y ions.

number.name: database.min_ion_index
number.label: Minimal ion index
number.help: Do not generate b1..bN or y1..yN ions for preliminary searching if value=N. Does not affect full scoring of PSMs. Default is 2.

keyvalues.name: database.variable_mods
keyvalues.label: Variable modifications
keyvalues.help: Use '[' and ']' for protein N-terminal and C-terminal modifications. Use '^' and '$' for peptide N-terminal and C-terminal modifications.

keyvalues.name: database.static_mods
keyvalues.label: Static modifications
keyvalues.help: Static modifications are applied after variable modifications.

number.name: database.max_variable_mods
number.label: Maximal number of variable modifications
number.help: Limit k-combinations of variable modifications. Default is 2.

string.name: database.decoy_tag
string.label: Decoy tag
string.help: The tag used to identify decoy entries in the FASTA database. Default is 'rev_'.

checkbox.name: database.generate_decoys
checkbox.label: Generate decoys
checkbox.help: If true, ignore decoys in the FASTA database matching 'Decoy tag', and generate internally reversed peptides.

range.name: precursor_tol.da
range.label: Precursor tolerance
range.help: First value is substracted from the experimental precursor to match theoretical peptides

range.name: precursor_tol.ppm
range.label: Precursor tolerance
range.help: First value is substracted from the experimental precursor to match theoretical peptides

range.name: fragment_tol.da
range.label: Fragment tolerance
range.help: First value is substracted from the experimental precursor to match theoretical peptides

range.name: fragment_tol.ppm
range.label: Fragment tolerance
range.help: First value is substracted from the experimental precursor to match theoretical peptides

range.name: isotope_errors
range.label: Isotope error
range.help: C13 isotopic envelope to consider for precursor

checkbox.name: wide_window
checkbox.label: Search in wide-window/DIA mode
checkbox.help: Ignore precursor tolerance and search in wide-window/DIA mode

checkbox.name: deisotope
checkbox.label: Perform deisotoping and charge state deconvolution on MS2 spectra
checkbox.help: If selected, Sage will attempt to deisotope and deconvolute the charge state of fragment ions in an MS2 spectra. This can speed up searches on high-res MS/MS data. Default is 'no'.

number.name: min_peaks
number.label: Minimum number of peaks per MS2 spectrum
number.help: Only process MS2 spectra with at least N peaks. Default is 15.

number.name: max_peaks
number.label: Maximum number of peaks per MS2 spectrum
number.help: Take the top N most intense MS2 peaks to search. Default is 150.

number.name: min_matched_peaks
number.label: Minimum number of matched b+y ions
number.help: Minimum number of matched b+y ions to use for reporting PSMs. This value should be tuned per-dataset, and should be increased if chimeric searching is enabled. Default is 4.

number.name: max_fragment_charge
number.label: Maximum fragment ion charge states to consider
number.help: The maximum fragment ion charge states to consider (default: null - use precursor z-1).

select.name: quant.tmt
select.label: TMT
select.help: Select the TMT type you want to use

number.name: quant.tmt_settings.level
number.label: MS-level to perform TMT
number.help: The MS-level to perform TMT quantification on. Default is 3.

checkbox.name: quant.tmt_settings.sn
checkbox.label: use Signal/Noise instead of intensity for TMT quant
checkbox.help: Use Signal/Noise instead of intensity for TMT quantification. Requires noise values in mzML.

select.name: quant.lfq_settings.peak_scoring
select.label: Peak scoring
select.help: Hybrid scoring combines RT-based and spectral-angle based scoring to identify the best MS1 peak to quantify. It is recommended that you do not change this setting.

select.name: quant.lfq_settings.integration
select.label: Integration
select.help: The method used for integrating peak intensities. Default is 'sum'.

number.name: quant.lfq_settings.spectral_angle
number.label: Spectral angle
number.help: Threshold for the normalized spectral angle similarity measure (observed vs theoretical isotopic envelope), ranging from 0 to 1. Default is 0.7.

number.name: quant.lfq_settings.ppm_tolerance
number.label: ppm tolerance
number.help: Tolerance for matching MS1 ions in parts per million. Default is 5.

range.name: precursor_charge
range.label: Precursor Charge
range.help: If charge states are not annotated in the mzML, or if 'wide window' mode is turned on, then consider all precursors with a charge state between those two values. Default is [2, 4].

checkbox.name: predict_rt
checkbox.label: Use retention time prediction model as an feature for LDA

number.name: report_psms
number.label: Number of PSMs to report for each spectra
number.help: The number of PSMs to report for each spectrum. Higher values might disrupt re-scoring, it is best to search with multiple values. Default is 1.
